title: On-Site Discrimination and Harassment
summary: During a worksite interaction, several workers engaged in repeated instances of discriminatory and harassing behavior directed toward a female coworker and others on site. The incident involved the use of derogatory language, exclusionary behavior, and comments that reinforced gender-based bias and hostility.

title: Racial Discrimination Toward An Apprentice
summary: During a morning break at the North Dock construction site, several workers were overheard making discriminatory remarks toward a recently hired apprentice who identifies as Indigenous.
